sentences.en: And maybe she didn't murder her flatmate. And just maybe these two facts are entirely related.
sentences.cn: 也许，诺克斯确曾经在某趟火车上与某个陌生男子发生了性关系，而她的确没有杀害她的室友，那么恰好，这两个事实被完全地相互关联了起来。

sentences.en: My flatmate was in at the time.
One of flatmate is a welsh girl called Anna.
sentences.cn: 我有个舍友是威尔士的女孩子叫安娜.

sentences.en: Your flatmate seems like a really nice person.
sentences.cn: 和你合住一套公寓的人看上去是个好人啊.

words.tran_cn: 平坦的；扁平的；浅的；单调的

trans.tran_en: someone who shares a flat with one or more other people
